channel.title: Model Graph on Peter Grimshaw's Site
channel.description: Recent content in Model Graph on Peter Grimshaw's Site

item.title: Visualising Tensorflow Graphs
item.description: Recently I was looking at a Triton Server tutorial which used the tf2onnx utility for converting a tensorflow model to onnx format. Triton is a tool which serves ML models, such as those from the tensorflow framework. Triton has a tensorflow backend, but it doesn’t support models from tenorflow v1 like the EAST text detection model used in the tutorial, so it’s necessary to convert the model to onnx format to serve it with Triton.
